item.title: Clean Coder
item.description: Who is Robert C. Martin? What’s it all about? Take responsibility Work ethic Know your field Stay current Collaborate Mentoring Know your domain Identify with your employer Learn to say no Rules and principles for coding Acceptance Tests Managing time Meetings Scrum Sprint Planning Sprint Retro Discussions Code Estimations Pressure Conclusion Who is Robert C. Martin? Robert C. Martin is a legend in the development industry.
